entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing drizzle changing to periods of rain this morning. Periods of snow inland and over higher terrain. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm except snowfall amount 4 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind becoming northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 07 March 2023
